Petra Sigmund
Petra Sigmund is Deputy Director General for East Asia, Southeast Asia and the Pacific at the Federal Foreign Office of Germany.

Prior to that she was director of the East Asia Division (2015 – 2017) and the Division for France and Benelux (2013 – 2015).

From 2006 – 2010 she worked at the German Federal Chancellery as Head of Division for relations with EU member states, EU enlargement and EU-relations with non-European countries.

Before that, she headed the Trade Promotion Office at the German Embassy in Beijing.

Petra Sigmund gathered international experience during postings in Paris (2010 – 2013), Beijing (2004 – 2006) and Brussels (1998 – 2001). She studied Sinology, Political Science and Economics at the Freie Universität Berlin and the Renda University in Beijing.

https://asiasociety.org/switzerland/events/talk-library-how-germany-thinks-about-asia

主管亞洲政策的德國外交部官員席格孟特（Petra Sigmund）回應時，首先肯定台灣活潑的民主和對人權及言論自由的保障，但隨後也說明德國在1972年與中國建交後，就遵守排除與台灣維持邦交可能性的「一個中國」政策，世界多數國家亦是如此，德國並無意改變。

BERLIN, July 3 (Xinhua) -- The documentary "Beijing Night" launched Monday in Berlin, and is set to be broadcast on five German TV stations in three days.
"Beijing Night" is a documentary TV program filmed by Beijing TV station, covering daily life, travel, fashion, history and film of Beijing.
The documentary is scheduled to be broadcast every Friday night for a whole year on Germany's center.tv, Rheinmain.tv, Salve.tv, CityVision.tv, and on TV Berlin for three days.
With a total of 52 episodes that last 30 minutes each, "Beijing Night" intends to show the German audience the real daily lives of Chinese people and both the ancient and modern sides of Beijing city.

Petra Sigmund, director of the China department of the German foreign ministry, said at the launching ceremony that "Beijing Night" would serve as a good opportunity for German people to learn more about China and Beijing.


http://www.xinhuanet.com//english/2017-07/04/c_136414455.htm

condom 香港人

外交部代表Petra Sigmund不斷重複並強調，當前德國與台灣在各領域上的往來、訪問是很密切的，但中國是德國重要的合作夥伴，而「一個中國」政策是現行德國的外交政策。另類選擇黨代表則單刀直入提問「德國理解的一中政策下，那台灣到底是不是中國領土的一部分」？Petra Sigmund回應說：「台灣是中國的一部分」，更補充提到先前德國地圖出版問題上，中國強烈的抗議與反應，凸顯出中國與台灣問題的敏感性。可謂直接點出當前德國對台政策上，官方立場的認識與理解。

中國是德國當前最大貿易往來國，德國對中出口貿易，是德國對外出口的第三名（7.1%），中國也是德國進口貿易中，排名第一名的進口國家（2018年度，佔比6.9%），德國對中貿易依存度達到7.1%。而德國GDP中，近半貢獻來自進出口貿易，這也可以說明中國對德國的重要性。與此同時，德國總GDP亦佔了歐盟的五分之一，使得德國對外政策也無形中影響了歐盟的對外態度。
